summary: THE SLIDING DOOR ON THE DRIVER'S SIDE WILL NOT CLOSE INTERMITTENTLY.   *AK   THE BRAKES SQUEALED AND WOULD GRIND, THE LEFT (DRIVER) HUB CAP RATTLED AND SHAKED, WATER LEAKED IN BACK SEAT.  THE SERVICE TECHNICIAN SAID THAT METAL BRAKES DIDN'T HAVE PADS, THE FRONT (STEERING) SHAKED, THE ROTOR(S) HAD WORN OUT, THE RIGHT INSIDE DOOR PANEL WAS LOOSE, THE SPEAKER HAD GONE OUT, THE POWER STEERING SQUEAKED PER INOICE, THE A/C CHIRPED, AND THERE WAS A WIND NOISE IN THE FRONT DOORS.   *SCC
